Mayor & City Council

Mayor Katherine Ragston kragston@hempsteadcitytx.gov
Position 1 David Shelburne dshelburne@hempsteadcitytx.gov
Position 2 Veronica Klausmeyer vklausmeyer@hempsteadcitytx.gov
Position 3 Mayor Pro Tem Lonnie Garfield lgarfield@hempsteadcitytx.gov
Position 4 Rooster Smith rsmith@hempsteadcitytx.gov
Position 5 Nora Hodges nhodges@hempsteadcitytx.gov

All City Council Members can be contacted by email. City Council meets on the 1st and 3rd Monday of each calendar month beginning at 6:00 PM, in the City Hall Conference Room located at 1125 Austin St. The City Council may also meet at other locations other than City Hall for Special Meetings. If meetings are canceled, please see calendar for any cancellations. Meetings of the City Council - Regular or Special Meetings - are open to the public. The City Council must be in open session in order to take formal action on any matter. City Ordinances are municipal laws adopted by the City Council to maintain the health, safety and welfare of the citizens and customers. The Council also may consider Resolutions, which are statements of policy or support for a specific issue but may not require fiscal or staff resources. Three votes of the Council are needed to approve or disapprove any Council item.
